text: @StephenKing Trump has been giving long daily briefings for weeks. And we're doing better than Belgium, Spain, Ireland, UK, Italy, France, Sweden, and the Netherlands, thanks in no small part to Trump limiting travel to and from China starting in January. https://t.co/HtWbhsA5UW
